short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds hints to problems on Kattis. Hint source: http://cpbook.net/methodstosolve

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fetches hints from cpbook.net/methodstosolve, then displays it neatly on selected pages on Kattis. Useful for learning Competitive Programming!
